language.entry: "Even in this desolate clot of soul, life is still warming"
You are not alone... Some cosmic prescence lurks around these halls...
You are not alone... Some cosmic prescence lurks around these halls...
{?hero_names}%s halted the horror's advances, for now
A sinister apprehension envelopes the damp caverns. Tread carefully, for you never know lurks on the other side...
Some sort of anomaly is occuring in the cove. Some connection to another realm is being established. Our party does not require additional encumberments, find the causal force and eliminate it.
%+d%% Vitesse de Combustion de la Torche
"Meme dans cette amas d'âmes désolés , la vie est toujours présente"
Vous n'êtes pas seuls... Une présence cosmique rôdes dans ces piéces...
Vous n'êtes pas seuls... Une présence cosmique rôdes dans ces piéces...
{?hero_names}%s ont mis un terme à la progression de l'horreur, pour le moment
Une sinistre angoisse se fais resentir dans ces humides cavernes. Avancez prudemment, vous ne savez jamais ce qui ce trouve de l'autre coté...

Une anomalie a été découverte dans la crique. Une sorte de connexion à une réalité est en train d'étre établie. Notre hameau n'a pas besoin de plus de nuisances , trouvez la cause de ceci et éliminez-la.
"In this clot of another's soul, life is still warming"
Be careful with DOTs, only bring which you can cure
Be careful with DOTs, only bring which you can cure
{?hero_names}%s halted the horror's advances, for now
A sinister apprehension envelopes the damp caverns. Tread carefully, for you never know lurks on the other side...
Some sort of anomaly is occuring in the cove. Some connection to another realm is being established. Our party does not require additional encumberments, find the causal force and eliminate it.
"In this clot of another's soul, life is still warming"
Be careful with DOTs, only bring which you can cure
Be careful with DOTs, only bring which you can cure
{?hero_names}%s halted the horror's advances, for now
A sinister apprehension envelopes the damp caverns. Tread carefully, for you never know lurks on the other side...
Some sort of anomaly is occuring in the cove. Some connection to another realm is being established. Our party does not require additional encumberments, find the causal force and eliminate it.
"En este Coágulo de Alma, la vida Todavia se aprecia"
Cuidado con el DsT, Solo incluye lo que Puedas Curar
Cuidado con DsT, solo incuye lo que Puedas Curar
{?hero_names}%s Detuvo a El Horror, Por ahora
Una Aparicion Siniestra Cubre las viejas Cavernas. Marcha con cuidado, No sabemos que merodea por aqui...
Alguna Anomalia Ha surgido. Una Connecion a Otro Reino se establecio. Nuestro grupo no necesita mas distracciones, Encuentra la Causa y eliminala.
"Neste coágulo da alma de outro, a vida continua calorosa"
Tenha cuidado com DsTs, traga apenas o que puder curar
Tenha cuidado com DsTs, traga apenas o que puder curar
{?hero_names}%s interromperam os avanços do horror, por enquanto
Uma apreenção sinistra envolve as cavernas úmidas. Siga cuidadosamente, pois nunca se sabe o que espreita do outro lado...
Algum tipo de anomalia está ocorrendo na enseada. Alguma conexão para outro reino está sendo estabelecida. Nosso grupo não requer onerações adicionais, encontre a força causal e elimine-a.
"В этом сгустке души - еще теплится жизнь"
Будьте осторжны с местами, приносите лишь то, что можете унести
Будьте осторжны с местами, приносите лишь то, что можете унести
Мрачное присуствие охватывает сыре пещеры. Будьте осторожны, ибо вы даже не представляйте, что за свет находится на той стороне...
Странная аномалия находится в бухте. Некая свзял с другой реальностью теряет стабильность. Вашей команды не нужны лишние преграды, найдите истинную причину и уничтожте её.
"In this clot of another's soul, life is still warming"
Be careful with DOTs, only bring which you can cure
Be careful with DOTs, only bring which you can cure

“在这块他者的灵魂凝块中，生命能量仍旧温暖”
当心持续伤害效果，尽量多些带能够治愈持续伤害效果的道具和技能
当心持续伤害效果，尽量多些带能够治愈持续伤害效果的道具和技能
{?hero_names}%s阻止了恐怖之物的进发，仅是暂时的
一种不想的恐惧笼罩着潮湿的洞穴。小心行事，因为你永远不知道路的另一边潜伏着什么……
海湾中出现了一些异象。这里与另一领域的某些连接正在建立。我们的队伍无法承担起额外的后果，找到这一切的原因并消除它。
